_source.text: 1) Red Dead Redemption is indeed a great game (I certainly don't think it's better than Tetris, but that's another discussion ;) .

text: 1) Red Dead **Redemption** is indeed a great game (I certainly don't think it's **better** **than** **Tetris**, but that's another discussion ;) .

_source.text: A few tracks fare better than others: "Keys in tha Damier" isn't too far from the sample-driven bangers of Dipset yesteryear, and "Talk My Nigga" has the fiercest rapping on the tape despite both rappers jacking their cadence from Crazy Town's "Butterfly".

text: A few tracks fare **better** **than** others: "Keys in tha Damier" isn't too far from the sample-**driven**
rappers jacking their cadence from Crazy Town's "**Butterfly**".

_source.text: 2012 had XCOM, The Last Story, Growlanser IV, Legend of Heroes Trails in the Sky, Mass Effect 3, Tales of Graces, and so on, all of which I liked better than anything from 2013.

text: 2012 had XCOM, The Last Story, **Growlanser** IV, **Legend** of Heroes Trails in the Sky, Mass Effect 3
, Tales of Graces, and so on, all of which I liked **better** **than** anything from 2013.
